schema.description: AI-powered personalized health and fitness planning with custom dietary and workout recommendations

elements.text:
# AI Health & Fitness Planner
                
    Get personalized dietary and fitness plans tailored to your goals and preferences.
    Our AI-powered system considers your unique profile to create the perfect plan for you.
    
    **Features:**
    - Personalized meal planning
    - Custom workout routines
    - Goal-specific recommendations
    - Nutritional guidance
    - Exercise instructions

elements.name: age
elements.label: Age
elements.placeholder: Enter your age (e.g., 25)

elements.name: weight
elements.label: Weight (kg)
elements.placeholder: Enter your weight in kg (e.g., 70)

elements.name: height
elements.label: Height (cm)
elements.placeholder: Enter your height in cm (e.g., 170)

elements.name: sex
elements.label: Sex
elements.placeholder: Male, Female, or Other

elements.name: activity_level
elements.label: Activity Level
elements.placeholder: Sedentary, Lightly Active, Moderately Active, Very Active, Extremely Active

elements.name: dietary_preferences
elements.label: Dietary Preferences
elements.placeholder: Vegetarian, Keto, Gluten Free, Low Carb, Dairy Free, etc.

elements.name: fitness_goals
elements.label: Fitness Goals
elements.placeholder: Lose Weight, Gain Muscle, Endurance, Stay Fit, Strength Training

schema.description: AI-powered movie concept development with script writing and casting suggestions

elements.text:
# 🎬 AI Movie Production Agent
                
    Bring your movie ideas to life with AI-powered script writing and casting direction.
    Our specialized agents will develop your concept into a professional movie pitch.
    
    **Features:**
    - Professional script outline development
    - Character creation and development
    - AI-powered casting suggestions
    - Three-act structure planning
    - Production timeline estimates
    - Marketing strategy recommendations

elements.name: movie_idea
elements.label: Movie Idea
elements.value: A young programmer discovers their code can alter reality
elements.placeholder: Describe your movie idea in detail...

elements.name: genre
elements.label: Genre
elements.placeholder: Action, Comedy, Drama, Sci-Fi, Horror, Romance, Thriller

elements.name: target_audience
elements.label: Target Audience
elements.placeholder: General, Children, Teenagers, Adults, Mature

elements.name: estimated_runtime
elements.label: Estimated Runtime (minutes)
elements.placeholder: Enter runtime in minutes (60-300)

schema.description: Analyze images to predict visual attention patterns using AI-powered heatmaps and focus maps.

elements.text:
# AttentionInsight Analysis Agent
                
    This agent analyzes images using AttentionInsight API to predict where people will look when viewing an image.
    It generates heatmaps, saliency maps, and focus maps to understand visual attention patterns.

elements.name: image_input
elements.label: Image URL or File Path
elements.placeholder: Enter image URL (http/https) or local file path

schema.description: AI-powered tutorial generator that creates comprehensive programming tutorials by analyzing and comparing content from multiple websites.

elements.text:
# Coding Tutorial Generator Agent
    
    Generate comprehensive programming tutorials by analyzing and comparing content from multiple websites.
    This AI agent scrapes programming-related URLs, analyzes the content, and creates well-structured tutorials.
    
    **Features:**
    - Multi-website content analysis
    - Automatic tutorial structuring
    - Code formatting and explanations
    - Reference citations and source tracking
    - Programming-focused content filtering

elements.name: query
elements.label: Tutorial Topic/Query
elements.placeholder: Enter the programming topic you want to learn about (e.g., 'Python decorators', 'React hooks', 'Git branching')

elements.name: urls
elements.label: URLs (comma-separated)
elements.placeholder: Enter programming-related URLs separated by commas (e.g., https://example1.com, https://example2.com)

schema.description: Generate AI content (images/videos) and mint as NFTs on Cardano blockchain using NMKR Studio.

elements.text:
# Content to NFT Agent
                
    This agent generates AI content (images or videos) based on your description and mints it as an NFT on the Cardano blockchain.
    The NFT will be sent directly to your Cardano wallet address.

elements.name: prompt
elements.label: Content Description
elements.value: A digital painting of a futuristic city with floating islands
elements.placeholder: Describe the image or video you want to generate

elements.name: content_type
elements.label: Content Type (image or video)
elements.placeholder: Enter 'image' or 'video'

elements.name: wallet_address
elements.label: Cardano Wallet Address
elements.placeholder: Your Cardano wallet address (addr_test1... or addr1...)

elements.name: display_name
elements.label: NFT Display Name
elements.placeholder: Name for your NFT

schema.description: Conduct comprehensive research and analysis using DeepSeek's advanced AI models including reasoning capabilities.

elements.text:
# DeepSeek Research Agent
                
    This agent uses DeepSeek's advanced AI models to conduct comprehensive research and analysis.
    Choose between regular chat completion or the advanced reasoning model for complex queries.

elements.name: query
elements.label: Research Query
elements.placeholder: Enter your research question or topic...

schema.description: Generate LLMs.txt files from websites using Firecrawl API and upload to Digital Ocean Spaces.

elements.text:
# LLMs.txt Generator Agent
                
    This agent generates LLMs.txt files from websites using Firecrawl API and uploads them to Digital Ocean Spaces for download.
    LLMs.txt files contain website content optimized for Large Language Models.

elements.name: urls
elements.label: Website URLs (separate multiple URLs with semicolons)
elements.placeholder: Enter website URLs separated by semicolons

elements.name: max_urls
elements.label: Max URLs per site (default: 15)
elements.placeholder: Maximum number of URLs to analyze per site

elements.name: show_full_text
elements.label: Show full text (true/false)
elements.placeholder: Enter 'true' for full text or 'false' for summary

schema.description: AI-powered media trend analysis with advanced reporting capabilities

elements.text:
# Media Trend Analysis Agent
                
    This agent analyzes media trends across digital platforms using advanced AI tools.
    It identifies emerging trends, analyzes patterns, and provides actionable insights.
    
    **Features:**
    - Keyword-based trend analysis
    - Source-specific monitoring
    - Growth rate calculations
    - Future trend predictions
    - Comprehensive reporting

elements.name: keywords
elements.label: Keywords
elements.placeholder: Enter keywords to analyze (e.g., 'ai agents', 'cryptocurrency')

elements.name: sources
elements.label: Sources (Optional)
elements.placeholder: Enter specific sources (e.g., 'verge.com, linkedin.com')

elements.name: analysis_days
elements.label: Analysis Days
elements.placeholder: Number of days to analyze (default: 30)

schema.description: AI-powered meeting preparation using CrewAI agents for context analysis, industry insights, and strategic planning.

elements.text:
# Meeting Preparation Agent
                
    This agent creates comprehensive meeting preparation packages using AI agents.
    It analyzes company context, industry insights, and creates strategic meeting agendas.

elements.name: attendees
elements.label: Attendees (separate with semicolons)
elements.value: Patrick Tobler, CEO; Keanu Klestil, Developer

elements.name: focus_areas
elements.label: Focus Areas
elements.value: Market expansion opportunities and competitive analysis

schema.description: AI-powered press release generator that creates professional, engaging content from your input text and optional website analysis.

elements.text:
# Press Release Writer Agent
    
    Create professional, engaging press releases from your input text and optional URLs.
    This AI agent analyzes your information, scrapes relevant websites, and generates 
    high-quality press releases tailored to your specifications.
    
    **Features:**
    - Intelligent content analysis
    - Website scraping for additional context
    - Professional press release formatting
    - SEO-optimized content structure

elements.name: text
elements.label: Press Release Information
elements.placeholder: Enter the information for your press release. Include URLs if you want the agent to scrape additional context from websites.
